address: Xã Long Cốc, Huyện Tân Sơn, Tỉnh Phú Thọ
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change for "Xã Long Cốc, Huyện Tân Sơn, Tỉnh Phú Thọ"**

My task is to pinpoint the updated administrative location for the address "Xã Long Cốc, Huyện Tân Sơn, Tỉnh Phú Thọ". I approached this systematically, relying on my knowledge of Vietnam's administrative restructuring.

First, I examined the possibility of any province-level mergers or changes. Using Resolution 60-NQ/TW, I verified that "Tỉnh Phú Thọ" remains unchanged. This establishes the overarching context of my search.

Next, I focused on ward-level modifications. I delved into "Other resolutions," specifically "1676/NQ-UBTVQH15," which pertains to administrative adjustments within Phú Thọ Province. I carefully scrutinized the relevant lines within the resolution to see what has happened to "Xã Long Cốc."

I noted that line 52 is highly relevant: "52. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Tam Thanh, Vinh Tiền và Long Cốc thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Long Cốc**." This clearly indicates that the original "Xã Long Cốc" has been reorganized, merged with "Tam Thanh" and "Vinh Tiền," to form a *new* "Xã Long Cốc." Crucially, the ward itself continues to exist under the same name, although its composition has been altered. I had to pay close attention to the wording - "xã" refers to wards, not the district level of "Huyện".

With the new ward name identified, I cross-referenced it with the "New wards" list for Phú Thọ. I found a direct match: `{"ward_code":"08620","ward_name":"Xã Long Cốc","province_name":"Tỉnh Phú Thọ"}`. This list verifies the details.

Based on my analysis of the resolution and the direct match in the new wards data, I am highly confident that the updated address for the location is now the new "Xã Long Cốc" with the "ward_code" of "08620", within "Tỉnh Phú Thọ." The original ward exists, just as part of a newly merged entity.

citation.header: 1676/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Phú Thọ
citation.line: 52. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Tam Thanh, Vinh Tiền và Long Cốc thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Long Cốc.
